alert.note: Alert for Leake; Neshoba (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 8:27AM CDT until April 17 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Leake County in central Mississippi... Neshoba County in east central Mississippi... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 826 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carthage, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Edinburg and Madden around 840 AM CDT. Pearl River and Dowdville around 845 AM CDT. Philadelphia around 850 AM CDT. Dixon around 855 AM CDT. Neshoba around 905 AM CDT. Bethsaida around 910 AM CDT. House around 915 AM CDT. Herbert Springs around 920 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Tucker, Standing Pine and Redwater. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
